title: Project ARA from Google
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ara%20googlesmall_3750.png)

Anyone knows which font is used in the new video from Project ARA (the modular phone) from Google? I tried other places but there is no way to identify the font...

The video here [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=intua\_p4kE0](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042620/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.youtube.com/watch%3Fv%3Dintua_p4kE0)

Thanks.
author: CarlosGo
